Title: Sing a Song of Patrick
Plot: Patrick gets an offer to write a song, but he can't remember anything. When he wrote his first poem, he got hit by dodgeballs! It seems like Patrick had made a song, but it is horrible and they can't play it on the radio station. So Patrick puts the song up on the antenna, and it is so bad, it starts an angry mob!
Writer: Luke Brookshier, Tom King, Steven Banks
